::KitKat::
She smiled at Drillbit,"You know, I talked to Phobia. We may get even 
with Megatron yet. He's now without a team and that means he's open 
to attack."

Feline::
She smiled and walked over to HotRod. She kissed his cheek,"You know, 
there is always later on tonight."
She went back to her bench and started to finish up on the circuit 
boards.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Good, hon, glad to know, that we'll be back on are feet."
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He looked at her, puzzled.
> "Oh! I didn't mean we should go and..., when I said that." He went 
back
> to the leg he was working on.
> "I hope the others at the battle are ok."
> 
> ::K9::
> 
> He saw a bot approach from the air.
> "Oh no, hope I'm not in any ones terratory."
